task.title: Create Accounts
task.shortdesc: Accounts are the highest entity for managing your users, groups and roles. Each account owns and controls all the resources created under it and its set of assigned permissions.

task.title: Create an account
task.shortdesc: Add the details of your new account:

step.cmd: Type the name of your new account.
In the Add a user text field, type the name of each user to include in this account and click Add User.

info.note: The admin user will be created for each account as part of the account creation, in addition to any other defined users. Because the admin user is created automatically, you do not have to do add it manually.

step.cmd: Repeat for each user to include in the account.

task.title: Account Detail - Quotas
task.shortdesc: Quotas lets you define limits on resources that users for this account is allowed to create. The quotas you define will be saved as a policy that will appear in the account's policy list.

step.cmd: Expand the section for each service that you want to specify limits for, and type in the maximum number of that resource in the text field. Leaving a text field blank means no limit is assigned to that resource.
Click the Create Account button to save your work, or click the Cancel button to cancel the operation.
step.stepresult: Creating the account assigns it an ID, then generates and downloads a .csv file containing user information along with passwords and access keys associated with each user.
